text: aur yadi kisee stree ko apane pati se durvyavahaar athava vimukh hone kee shanka ho, to un donon par koee dosh nahin ki aapas mein koee sandhi kar len aur sandhi kar lena hee achchha[1] hai. lobh to sabhee mein hota hai. yadi tum ek-doosare ke saath upakaar karo aur (allaah se) darate raho, to nihsandeh tum jo kuchh kar rahe ho, allaah usase soochit hai
